TABLE 1  Average EPE results on MPI Sintel set. "-ft" means fine-tuning on the 
MPI Sintel training set and the numbers in the parenthesis are results 
on the data the methods have been fine-tuned on. ft-final gives more 
weight to the final pass during fine-tuning. FlowNetC2 has been trained 
using the same procedure as PWC-Net-ft-final.

the methods have been fine-tuned on.

caption:
TABLE 5 
Training dataset schedule leads to better local minima. () indicates 
results on the dataset the method has been trained on.

TABLE 6 
Model size and running time. PWC-Net-small drops DenseNet 
connections. For training, the lower bound of 14 days for FlowNet2 is 
obtained by 6(FlowNetC) + 2?4 (FlowNetS). The inference time is for 
1024 ? 448 resolution images.
